00032 #ifndef Socket_h
00033 #define Socket_h 1
00034 
00035 #include <netinet/in.h>
00036 
00037 #include <string>
00038 
00039 using std::string ;
00040 
00041 class Socket
00042 {
00043 protected:
00044     int                         _socket ;
00045     bool                        _connected ;
00046     bool                        _listening ;
00047     struct sockaddr_in          _from ;
00048     bool                        _addr_set ;
00049 public:
00050                                 Socket()
00051                                     : _socket( 0 ),
00052                                       _connected( false ),
00053                                       _listening( false ),
00054                                       _addr_set( false ) {}
00055                                 Socket( int socket,
00056                                         const struct sockaddr_in & )
00057                                     : _socket( socket ),
00058                                       _connected( true ),
00059                                       _listening( false ),
00060                                       _addr_set( true ) {}
00061     virtual                     ~Socket() { close() ; }
00062     virtual void                connect() = 0 ;
00063     virtual bool                isConnected() { return _connected ; }
00064     virtual void                listen() = 0 ;
00065     virtual bool                isListening() { return _listening ; }
00066     virtual void                close() ;
00067     virtual void                send( const string &str, int start, int end ) ;
00068     virtual int                 receive( char *inBuff, int inSize ) ;
00069     virtual int                 getSocketDescriptor()
00070                                 {
00071                                     return _socket ;
00072                                 }
00073 
00074     virtual Socket *            newSocket( int socket,
00075                                            const struct sockaddr_in &f ) = 0 ;
00076 } ;
00077 
00078 #endif // Socket_h
